title: I can't delete more than one message at a time
content:
This just started tonight. I can't delete more than one message at a time. If I highlight multiple messages, it only deletes the most current message. It also shows the highlighted messages as being read, even though they were not opened?

Can somebody please call me and explain what is going on and how to fix this. I am not good with computers and online help never works for me. I already tried that tonight and got nowhere. Chatting never fixes anything. I don't understand the things that are being said. I am a talk on the phone with a tech and work through the problem kinda person.

Thunderbird is definitely running slow - I don't know if that means anything.

Can somebody please help?

Jimmy 908-963-4032
creator: JimFerrante

title: Email folders imported from MailStore do not have a .msf file, so emails are not showing up in Thunderbird
content:
Hi,

Most of the email folders I exported from MS Outlook 2007 (using MailStore) appeared correctly in Thunderbird, but some folders have no emails in them. When I look at the profile, these folders do not have a corresponding .msf file, which I gather is the Thunderbird indexing file. I have tried exporting these folders separately, but that doesn't seem to work at all; no new profile seems to be created so nothing gets updated in Thunderbird. I have attached a screen shot and can provide others as required. I am a volunteer for Balance & Dizziness Canada and some of the folders I need to export to Thunderbird have a lot of emails and are important for me to have available to refer back to. Many thanks for any help you can provide.

- Andrea Wilson, Webmaster, Balance & Dizziness Canada https://balanceanddizziness.org
creator: ablewebs
